page.title: 16EVERCREECH HORTICULTURAL SOC
page.content: HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY In Evercreech there is a Horticultural Show which is held every year in one or two of Mr.Craddock's fields at Rodmore farm.There is a big marquee in one of the fields where people put their entries in craft, photography,vegetables,flowers, painting,writing etc.Each section has a 1st,2nd,3rd prize.Each section is also done in ages for children.They usually have two fairground attractions which are swingboats and a bouncy castle. The show is held at the beginning of September. There is a sale of plants and seeds in the Spring of each year.
